name: Vine Gunner
description:
You are a poor alien stuck in a arena full of creature with only one weapon : the vine gunner.

This game made for he Kenney JAM 2022 by me, OctoDice.

Theme : Growtt

Controls :

Movement : Arrows / ZQSD / WASD

Dash : Space Bar / Shift Key

Aiming : Mouse 

Shooting : Left Mouse Button
